statements.query: MATCH (subnet:EC2Subnet) WHERE NOT EXISTS((subnet)-[:HAS_EXPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]->(:EC2RouteTableAssociation)) WITH subnet MATCH (subnet)-[:MEMBER_OF_AWS_VPC]->(:AWSVpc)<-[:MEMBER_OF_AWS_VPC]-(:EC2RouteTable)-[:HAS_ASSOCIATION]->(asc:EC2RouteTableAssociation{main: true}) WITH subnet, asc MERGE (subnet)-[r:HAS_IMPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]->(asc) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = timestamp() SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
